mapper.select: -- retrieveGenTssPgsPtcRsstMbr 참여연구원 조회 SELECT DISTINCT PTC_RSST_MBR_SN AS ptcRsstMbrSn --참여연구원일련번호 , SA_SABUN_NEW AS saSabunNew --연구원사번 , DEPT_CODE AS deptCode --소속 , PTC_STRT_DT AS ptcStrtDt --참여시작일 , PTC_FNH_DT AS ptcFnhDt --참여종료일 , PTC_ROLE AS ptcRole --참여역할 , PTC_ROLE_DTL AS ptcRoleDtl --참여역할상세 , PTC_PRO AS ptcPro --참여율 , ISNULL(dbo.fn_getNameOnTssPgsStep(TSS_CD, 'USER', SA_SABUN_NEW) , SA_SABUN_NAME) AS saUserName --과제리더명 , ISNULL(dbo.fn_getNameOnTssPgsStep(TSS_CD, 'DEPT', DEPT_CODE) , DEPT_NAME) AS deptName --소속명 , dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('PTC_ROLE', PTC_ROLE) AS ptcRoleNm --참여역할명 , #{_userId} AS userId FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR /*과제참여연구원*/ WHERE TSS_CD = #{tssCd} ORDER BY saUserName

-- retrieveGenTssPgsTrwiBudg 개발비 조회 with tmp_cost_tb as ( select erp_cd ,YYYYMM ,L_GROUP ,L_GROUPTXT ,S_GROUP ,S_GROUPTXT ,KO_RSLT from IRIS_SAP_BUDG_S_COST where erp_cd =#{wbsCd} and left(YYYYMM, 4) = #{yyyy} group by erp_cd ,YYYYMM ,L_GROUP ,L_GROUPTXT ,S_GROUP ,S_GROUPTXT ,KO_RSLT )
select totTitle, expScnNm ,mm01, mm02, mm03,mm04,mm05,mm06,mm07,mm08,mm09,mm10,mm11,mm12 ,(mm01+ mm02+ mm03+mm04+mm05+mm06+mm07+mm08+mm09+mm10+mm11+mm12) as totSum from ( select L_GROUPTXT as totTitle ,S_GROUPTXT as expScnNm ,isnull(round(sum(mm1), 2) , 0) as 'mm01' ,isnull(round(sum(mm2), 2) , 0) as 'mm02' ,isnull(round(sum(mm3), 2) , 0) as 'mm03' ,isnull(round(sum(mm4), 2) , 0) as 'mm04' ,isnull(round(sum(mm5), 2) , 0) as 'mm05' ,isnull(round(sum(mm6), 2) , 0) as 'mm06' ,isnull(round(sum(mm7), 2) , 0) as 'mm07' ,isnull(round(sum(mm8), 2) , 0) as 'mm08' ,isnull(round(sum(mm9), 2) , 0) as 'mm09' ,isnull(round(sum(mm10), 2), 0) as 'mm10' ,isnull(round(sum(mm11), 2), 0) as 'mm11' ,isnull(round(sum(mm12), 2), 0) as 'mm12'
from ( select yyyymm ,L_GROUP ,L_GROUPTXT ,S_GROUP ,S_GROUPTXT ,case when right(a.yyyymm, 2) = '01' then sum( convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),a.KO_RSLT)/1000000)) end 'mm1' ,case when right(a.yyyymm, 2) = '02' then sum(convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),a.KO_RSLT)/1000000)) end 'mm2' ,case when right(a.yyyymm, 2) = '03' then sum(convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),a.KO_RSLT)/1000000)) end 'mm3' ,case when right(a.yyyymm, 2) = '04' then sum(convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),a.KO_RSLT)/1000000)) end 'mm4' ,case when right(a.yyyymm, 2) = '05' then sum(convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),a.KO_RSLT)/1000000)) end 'mm5' ,case when right(a.yyyymm, 2) = '06' then sum(convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),a.KO_RSLT)/1000000)) end 'mm6' ,case when right(a.yyyymm, 2) = '07' then sum(convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),a.KO_RSLT)/1000000)) end 'mm7' ,case when right(a.yyyymm, 2) = '08' then sum(convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),a.KO_RSLT)/1000000)) end 'mm8' ,case when right(a.yyyymm, 2) = '09' then sum(convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),a.KO_RSLT)/1000000)) end 'mm9' ,case when right(a.yyyymm, 2) = '10' then sum(convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),a.KO_RSLT)/1000000)) end 'mm10' ,case when right(a.yyyymm, 2) = '11' then sum(convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),a.KO_RSLT)/1000000)) end 'mm11' ,case when right(a.yyyymm, 2) = '12' then sum(convert(numeric(20,6), convert(numeric(20),a.KO_RSLT)/1000000)) end 'mm12'
from tmp_cost_tb a group by yyyymm,L_GROUP ,L_GROUPTXT ,S_GROUP ,S_GROUPTXT ) a group by L_GROUP ,L_GROUPTXT ,S_GROUP ,S_GROUPTXT ) a

-- retrieveGenTssTmpBudg 개발비 select '인건비' as totTitle ,COM_DTL_NM as expScnNm ,'' as 'mm01' ,'' as 'mm02' ,'' as 'mm03' ,'' as 'mm04' ,'' as 'mm05' ,'' as 'mm06' ,'' as 'mm07' ,'' as 'mm08' ,'' as 'mm09' ,'' as 'mm10' ,'' as 'mm11' ,'' as 'mm12' ,'' as 'totSum' from IRIS_ADM_COM_CD where COM_CD_CD = 'EXP_SCN_CD' and COM_DTL_CD like '01%' and COM_DTL_CD <> '01' union all select '운영경비' as totTitle ,COM_DTL_NM as expScnNm ,'' as 'mm01' ,'' as 'mm02' ,'' as 'mm03' ,'' as 'mm04' ,'' as 'mm05' ,'' as 'mm06' ,'' as 'mm07' ,'' as 'mm08' ,'' as 'mm09' ,'' as 'mm10' ,'' as 'mm11' ,'' as 'mm12' ,'' as 'totSum' from IRIS_ADM_COM_CD where COM_CD_CD = 'EXP_SCN_CD' and COM_DTL_CD like '02%' and COM_DTL_CD <> '02' union all select '경상개발비' as totTitle ,COM_DTL_NM as expScnNm ,'' as 'mm01' ,'' as 'mm02' ,'' as 'mm03' ,'' as 'mm04' ,'' as 'mm05' ,'' as 'mm06' ,'' as 'mm07' ,'' as 'mm08' ,'' as 'mm09' ,'' as 'mm10' ,'' as 'mm11' ,'' as 'mm12' ,'' as 'totSum' from IRIS_ADM_COM_CD where COM_CD_CD = 'EXP_SCN_CD' and COM_DTL_CD like '03%' and COM_DTL_CD <> '03' union all select '감가상각비' as totTitle ,COM_DTL_NM as expScnNm ,'' as 'mm01' ,'' as 'mm02' ,'' as 'mm03' ,'' as 'mm04' ,'' as 'mm05' ,'' as 'mm06' ,'' as 'mm07' ,'' as 'mm08' ,'' as 'mm09' ,'' as 'mm10' ,'' as 'mm11' ,'' as 'mm12' ,'' as 'totSum' from IRIS_ADM_COM_CD where COM_CD_CD = 'EXP_SCN_CD' and COM_DTL_CD like '04%' and COM_DTL_CD <> '04' union all select '합계' ,'합계' ,'' as 'mm01' ,'' as 'mm02' ,'' as 'mm03' ,'' as 'mm04' ,'' as 'mm05' ,'' as 'mm06' ,'' as 'mm07' ,'' as 'mm08' ,'' as 'mm09' ,'' as 'mm10' ,'' as 'mm11' ,'' as 'mm12' ,'' as 'totSum'

-- retrieveGenTssPgsAltrHist 변경이력 목록 조회 SELECT A.TSS_CD AS tssCd , A.WBS_CD AS wbsCd , A.PK_WBS_CD AS pkWbsCd , C.PRVS AS prvs , C.ALTR_PRE AS altrPre , C.ALTR_AFT AS altrAft , B.ALTR_RSON_TXT AS altrRsonTxt , B.ADD_RSON_TXT AS addRsonTxt , B.ALTR_ATTC_FIL_ID AS altrAttcFilId , ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR, D.APPROVER_PROCESSDATE, 23), CONVERT(NVARCHAR, C.LAST_MDFY_DT, 23)) AS altrApprDd FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST A INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_GEN_SMRY B ON A.TSS_CD = B.TSS_CD INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_SMRY_ALTR_LIST C ON A.TSS_CD = C.TSS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_COM_ITG_RDCS D ON A.TSS_CD = D.AFFR_CD AND D.APRDOCSTATE = 'A02' --고정값: A02(승인) WHERE A.PK_WBS_CD = #{pkWbsCd} AND A.PGS_STEP_CD = 'AL' --고정값: AL(변경) AND A.TSS_ST = '104'

-- retrieveGenTssAltrList 변경이력 상세리스트 조회 SELECT A.TSS_CD AS tssCd --과제코드 , A.ALTR_SN AS altrSn --변경일련번호 , A.PRVS AS prvs --항목 , A.ALTR_PRE AS altrPre --변경전 , A.ALTR_AFT AS altrAft --변경후 , ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR, D.APPROVER_PROCESSDATE, 23), CONVERT(NVARCHAR, A.LAST_MDFY_DT, 23)) AS altrApprDd , #{_userId} AS userId FROM IRIS_TSS_SMRY_ALTR_LIST A /*변경개요 목록*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_COM_ITG_RDCS D ON A.TSS_CD = D.AFFR_CD AND D.APRDOCSTATE = 'A02' --고정값: A02(승인) WHERE TSS_CD = #{tssCd}

-- genTssAltrDetailSearch 변경이력 상세 조회 SELECT A.TSS_CD AS tssCd --과제코드 , A.ALTR_RSON_TXT AS altrRsonTxt --변경사유 , A.ADD_RSON_TXT AS addRsonTxt --추가사유 , A.ALTR_ATTC_FIL_ID AS attcFilId --첨부파일 FROM IRIS_TSS_GEN_SMRY A WHERE A.TSS_CD = #{tssCd}
